PROJECT:
FLOATING SLAB

RAMARA, ON

ALEXIS GALVAO
DRAWING TITLE:
NOTES, PLAN & SECTION(S)

DESIGN BY: NA SHEET NO.: S1
SCALE: AS NOTED
PROJECT NO.: 25-01-073
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL NOTES:
1. REMOVE ALL TOPSOIL AND ORGANIC MATERIAL FROM THE BUILDING AREA.
2. SLAB MUST BE CARRIED DOWN TO NATURAL UNDISTURBED SOIL CAPABLE OF SUSTAINING 1500 PSF (75 kPa) PRESSURE UNDER BEARING OF 3000 PSF (150 kPa) ALLOWABLE STRUCTURAL/SLAB-ON-GRADE BEARING PRESSURE.
3. IF FILL IS TO BE BUILT UP, GRANULAR 'A' IS TO BE USED TO A COMPACTION MAXIMUM OF 98% S.P.D. OR AS MAY BE DETERMINED BY GEOTECHNICAL ENGINEER.
4. ENGINEERING BUILDING AND DRAWINGS PROVIDED INDICATE A BASIC CONCRETE FOUNDATION UNLESS NOTED OTHERWISE.
5. SLAB IS UNHEATED. IF NOT INSTALLED, CLIENT CONTRACTOR ACCEPTS THE POTENTIAL OF CRACKING/HEAVING OVER TIME (IF BUILDING IS NOT HEATED) OR HEAT LOSS (IF BUILDING IS HEATED).
6. IF SLAB IS NOT HEATED OR INSULATED, CLIENT CONTRACTOR ACCEPTS THE POTENTIAL OF CRACKING.
7. IF SLAB IS INSULATED, CLIENT MAY BE USED UP TO MAXIMUM OF 4" ABOVE SLAB.
8. CLIENT CONTRACTOR TO CONFIRM SLAB DIMENSIONS BEFORE ORDERING MATERIAL & STARTING CONSTRUCTION.

CONCRETE:
1. ALL CONCRETE ON THIS PROJECT SHALL HAVE A MINIMUM OF 20 DAY COMPRESSIVE STRENGTH OF 32 MPa WITH 6-8% AIR ENTRAINMENT AND 0.40 MAX WATER-TO-CEMENT RATIO.
2. ALL REBAR TO BE GRADE 400.
3. REBAR SPACING MINIMUM: BARS LAP 24"
4. WELDED WIRE MESH SHALL LAP 1 LAP.
5. SLAB ON GRADE SHALL BE CONSTRUCTED IN ACCORDANCE TO THE LATEST EDITION OF THE ONTARIO BUILDING CODE, CAN/CSA A23.1-00 AND LOCAL BY-LAWS.
6. SLAB ON GRADE SHALL BE CONSTRUCTED WITH:
   a) 6" WHERE CONCRETE IS IN CONTACT WITH EARTH (I.E. FOOTINGS)
   b) 8" WHERE CONCRETE IS NOT IN CONTACT WITH EARTH (I.E. SIDE OF THE FLOATING SLAB)
   c) SLAB ON GRADE SHALL BE ON 4" GRANULAR 'A' FILL (COMPACTED TO 98% S.P.D.) ON 6" COMPACTED GRANULAR 'B' FILL.
7. SLAB CUTS SHALL BE AT 10' FROM BUILDING.
8. SLAB IS NOT TO BE POURED ON FROZEN GROUND.
9. SLAB IS TO BE POURED MONOLITHICALLY IN ONE TIME.
10. SLIP JOINTS RECOMMENDED FOR ALL UTILITY CONNECTIONS.

REVIEW OF FLOATING SLABS:
IF REVIEW IS SIGNED OFF THE FLOATING SLAB IS REQUIRED, PROVIDE PHOTOS OF THE FOLLO...
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides a detailed plan and section for a floating slab foundation, including a thickened edge and pad footings. The plan view shows the layout and dimensions of the slab, while the section view details the construction of the thickened edge. General notes cover important construction requirements, such as concrete specifications, rebar spacing, and slab construction guidelines. The sheet is essential for ensuring proper foundation construction and includes specific instructions for review and verification before pouring concrete.
